title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 41.1 - Purpose and general description
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 41.1 - Purpose and general description

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth the application and
evaluation process for designation of entrepreneurship support centers, on a
competitive basis, under the Entrepreneurial Assistance Program. Entrepreneurship support centers shall provide training to dislocated workers, minorities and women in the principles and practice of entrepreneurship, in
order to prepare such persons to pursue self-employment
opportunities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
41.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
